name: headband with a twist
notes:
the headband is knit back and forth in the english rib, which is very warm and comfortable to wear. it has a twist in the middle - not only this looks classy, but itâ€™s also a clever way to hide the seam.

the size is easily adjustable.

for this project, i chose an alpaca and wool mix, that is warm and just a little fluffy. the yarn is very soft and great to work with. i used less than one skein.
